snippet: Martha C. Merrill, dean of admission and financial aid at Connecticut College, advises against a senior slide, no matter how much you may feel you have earned it.
abstract: Martha C. Merrill, dean of admission and financial aid at Connecticut College, advises against a senior slide, no matter how much you may feel you have earned it.
lead_paragraph: Martha C. Merrill is the dean of admission and financial aid at Connecticut College.

headline.main: A Dean's Advice to Seniors: Don't Slack Off
